item.title: 23 Nov 2025 10:30
item.description: On the phone, I use Signal’s note-to-self to record on-the-go thoughts or to quickly bookmark stuff. Later when on the laptop, I migrate these to my Trilium notes. After years of dabbling between multiple ’notes’ applications, this has stuck. Using the default messaging app as my notes ‘filter’ definitely streamlined the process. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: On the phone, I use Signal’s note-to-self to record on-the-go thoughts or to quickly bookmark stuff. Later when on the laptop, I migrate these to my Trilium notes. After years of dabbling between multiple ’notes’ applications, this has stuck. Using the default messaging app as my notes ‘filter’ definitely streamlined the process. ðŸ”—
